summary: Action required: update cluster OIDC thumbprint
description: OpenShift SREs have detected your OpenIDConnect Provider thumbprint has changed. Please follow the documentation to update your thumbprint: https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_openshift_service_on_aws/4/html/introduction_to_rosa/rosa-sts-about-iam-resources#rosa-sts-oidc-provider-requirements-for-operators_rosa-sts-about-iam-resources#. Update the OIDC thumbprint with the command 'aws iam update-open-id-connect-provider-thumbprint', or through the AWS Console under IAM -> Identity Providers.
